component.name: BYOD
component.summary: BYOD: Bring Your Own Distortion, Standalone

description.p: BYOD (Bring Your Own Distortion) is a guitar distortion plugin with a customisable signal chain that allows users to create their own guitar distortion effects. The plugin contains a wide variety of distortion effects from analog modelled circuits to purely digital creations, along with some musical tone-shaping filters, and a handful of other useful processing blocks.
BYOD is also available as LV2, CLAP and VST3 plugins.

ul.li: Added "Laser Trem" module.

Improved preset searching.

Added "Crying Child" module.
